item.title: Guidelines to build sane Docker images
item.description: Building docker containers is easy, dangerous and can cause death You can build a Docker container with a lot of different ways, some are good, some are bad and others are REALLY bad. The following document will try to give some basic rules and guidelines on how to build a Docker container that is as light as possible, simple, has valuable metadata, and doesn’t contain any unwanted secrets. Rules These are rules.
